column4: Is there a way to force the system to recompile the kernel? And yes, I really do need to :P
Somehow, somewhere, a module got compiled in that just won't go away, and it needs to.
What problem are you actually having?
I'm pretty sure that when I was running xorg-edgers packages, it compiled the binary nvidia kernel in somehow. Right now, it's stuck as a "permanent" module.
